mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE.NEXTVAL FROM dual
insert into IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE (SUBSCRIBEID, UNDERWRITERID, COMMODITYID, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS, PROPORTION, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE,SUBSCRIBEPRICE,STATE) values (#{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribecounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{subscribeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE set UNDERWRITERID = #{underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITYID = #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS = #{subscribecounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SUBSCRIBEPRICE = #{subscribeprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SUBSCRIBEID = #{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SUBSCRIBEID, UNDERWRITERID, COMMODITYID, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS, PROPORTION, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE,SUBSCRIBEPRICE,STATE from IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE where SUBSCRIBEID = #{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SUBSCRIBEID, UNDERWRITERID, COMMODITYID, SUBSCRIBECOUNTS, PROPORTION, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE,SUBSCRIBEPRICE,STATE from IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE
select sum(t.subscribecounts) from ipo_underwriter_subscribe t where t.commodityid=#{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.commodityid
select sum(t.subscricounts) from ipo_publisher_position t where t.commodityid=#{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.commodityid
select sum(t.proportion) from ipo_underwriter_subscribe t where t.commodityid=#{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by t.commodityid

SELECT A.* FROM(SELECT T.*,ROWNUM TNO FROM IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE T WHERE T.DELETE_FLAG=0 and T.STATE=1
and T.UNDERWRITERID like concat ( concat ('%',#{record.underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and T.COMMODITYID like concat ( concat ('%',#{record.commodityid ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY T.SUBSCRIBEID)A WHERE A.TNO BETWEEN #{beginnum} AND #{endnum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE T WHERE T.DELETE_FLAG=0 and T.STATE=1
and T.UNDERWRITERID like concat ( concat ('%',#{record.underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and T.COMMODITYID like concat ( concat ('%',#{record.commodityid ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select * from ( select t.*, rownum TNO from ( select sub.underwriterid,sub.commodityid,sub.subscribecounts,sub.proportion,deposit.amount,v.user_balance from ipo_underwriter_subscribe sub left join (select dep.subscribeid,sum(dep.amount)amount from ipo_underwriter_deposit dep group by dep.subscribeid)deposit on sub.subscribeid = deposit.subscribeid left join BR_BROKER bro on bro.brokerid = sub.underwriterid left join V_F_FIRMCURFUNDS v on bro.firmid = v.firmId where UNDERWRITERID like concat (concat('%',#{underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') ) t) c where c.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum} order by underwriterid
select count(*) from IPO_UNDERWRITER_SUBSCRIBE where UNDERWRITERID like concat (concat('%',#{underwriterid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
select t.* from ipo_underwriter_subscribe t where t.underwriterid=#{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.state=#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.subscribeid != #{subscribeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select t.* from ipo_underwriter_subscribe t where t.underwriterid=#{brokerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.state=#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
